name: Walking from Top of a Lisbon Hill down into the old city
description: We're starting on top of a Lisbon Hill, Parque Eduardo VII, which offers a beautiful view over Lisbon. (We can either meet at S. Sebastião metro station or on top of Parque Eduardo VII). From there, we´re going to walk downhill through one of the most famous streets of Lisbon into the lower part of Lisbon, known as the "Baixa". From there we continue on to the Miradouro de Sta. Justa, which also has a beautiful view. After this we go visit the castle of Lisbon. To end the trip we go to the Terreiro do Paço, one of the most famous squares of Lisbon, and walk a bit along the river. From there I can give you some tips on what you could do next.
